title: School Reopening and Blended Learning Operation Strategies in the COVID-19 Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational systems and digital device usage proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to enhance blended learning management competencies post-COVID-19 school reopening. VR simulations provide experiential learning of health safety protocols and educational effectiveness in real classroom settings

learning_goals: Participants can design blended learning implementation plans incorporating COVID-19 prevention guidelines.
Participants can propose at least two strategies to address learning gaps for vulnerable student groups (students with disabilities, marginalized communities) via VR simulations.
Participants can explain the process of establishing a collaborative system among local education authorities, parents, and teachers to create a safe learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
